scripts.deploy:local: source ../../../../common/.env.local && bun --env-file=../../../../common/.env.local -e "import {deployCollectible} from './deploy.js'; import {readFileSync} from 'fs'; const config = JSON.parse(readFileSync('./package.json', 'utf8')); console.log('ðŸ“ Using data file:', config.config.dataFileName); deployCollectible(config.config.dataFileName).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1)})"
